mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, cate_code, product_price, product_stock, product_color, product_size, product_discount, image_url) values(#{product_name}, #{cate_code}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock}, #{product_color}, #{product_size}, #{product_discount}, #{image_url})
